title: Google\Cloud\Dataproc\V1\SparkRBatch
name: SparkRBatch
description:
A configuration for running an Apache SparkR batch workload.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dataproc.v1.SparkRBatch

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.main_r_file_uri
params.description: Required. The HCFS URI of the main R file to use as the driver. Must be a .R or .r file.

params.name: data.args
params.description: Optional. The arguments to pass to the Spark driver. Do not include arguments that can be set as batch properties, such as --conf, since a collision can occur that causes an incorrect batch submission.

params.name: data.file_uris
params.description: Optional. HCFS URIs of files to be placed in the working directory of each executor.

params.name: data.archive_uris
params.description: Optional. HCFS URIs of archives to be extracted into the working directory of each executor. Supported file types: .jar, .tar, .tar.gz, .tgz, and .zip.
